roles_overview.category_change_failed: The role category could not be changed.
roles_overview.description:
Roles with similar permissions are grouped into categories, e.g. the <0>Planner category. Permissions for new injixo functionalities are automatically assigned to roles depending on their role category.
Roles in the <0>Other category do not get default permissions for new injixo functionalities.
Learn more in <1>Help Center.
roles_overview.heading: Roles

user_details.confirm_email: To continue we must confirm your email address.

delete_modal.confirmation: I understand that the user record and all scheduling data for <0>{{name}}</0> will be deleted.
delete_modal.description: The action cannot be undone. The user <0>{{name}}</0> and related scheduling data would be deleted permanently as a result.

end_staff_membership.description: Set a leave date for <0>{{name}}</0>. This will remove the user from the monthly invoice and disable their injixo login, but all of their scheduling data will be retained.
end_staff_membership.heading: End staff membership

delete_modal.title: Delete user
delete_modal.confirmation_skills_lms: I understand that the user record for <0>{{name}}</0> will be deleted and training history anonymized.
delete_modal.description_skills_lms: This action cannot be undone. The user <0>{{name}}</0> will be deleted from your Account section and also deactivated and anonymized in the learning management system (LMS) enrollment and reporting sections.

objectgroup_overview.heading: Object access
objectgroup_overview.description: To limit user access to only specific objects or data in injixo, create a group that defines all accessible objects, e.g. specific Dashboards. Every user can be granted with “Full access” or one of these restrictive object groups.
